metadata.Title: CVE-2019-5765 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An exposed debugging endpoint in the browser in Google Chrome on Androidprior to 72.0.3626.81 allowed a local attacker to obtain potentiallysensitive information from process memory via a crafted Intent.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
